data.description:
In react native AwesomeProject example, it gets bundle files with 2 options:

1. Load from development server
2. Load from pre-bundled file on disk
data.title: React Native Part 3

data.description: React Native is a hot topic recently in mobile app development world. It can be easily installed via [Facebook guide](https://facebook.github.io/react-native/docs/getting-started.html).
